name: DOP Party
description:
The brain teaser puzzle and casual game is now online!
DOP Party-Brain Puzzle is a fun and interesting game that challenges your brain with various puzzles.
Use the rubber to unravel the puzzle and enjoy the fun of the brain test.
In the process of deleting, you will exercise your brain and enjoy much of game fun.
Enjoy the casual game and play with your family or friends to challenge your brain with them!
Take a brain test to test your IQ to improve your brain functioning.
Key features:
Wonderful design
The meticulous logic design, unique level design, let you experience the charm of intense and exciting game.
Puzzle and simple
It is easy to operate and you can fully release your stress.
Simple and Funny
Simple and easy to play, you can go ahead at any time to have fun.
It's time to start an adventure with Delete Party-Tricky Quests.
